name: Float and Dash's Super Smash
description:
Made for the 2022 Global Game Jam

An endless runner inspired by those of the early 2000's! Switch between Float and Dash to smash your way through enemies cute and scary alike to get as far as you possibly can. But watch out! you'll have to make the best of both of their skills, and time your switches well to avoid getting pummeled yourself!

Programming/Design - Jonathan Tran & Armin Nouri

Music/SFX - Ryan Cheung & Sarah Crowe

Thanks to Pixel Frog, Ansimuz, Luiz Melo, and Lifty for Unity assets

And of course to all our fellow jammers for kind words, tips, and encouragement :)
